name: g-search_search
description: Search on Google for multiple keywords and return the results

queries.description: Array of search queries to perform

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return per query (default: 10)

noSaveState.description: Whether to avoid saving browser state (default: false)

locale.description: Locale setting for search results (default: en-US)

debug.description: Whether to enable debug mode (showing browser window), overrides the --debug command line flag if specified
